templates.name: Pixar Style
templates.description: Pixar-inspired sticker with 3D cartoon rendering, expressive faces, and a polished, cinematic look.
templates.prompt: A Pixar-inspired sticker with 3D cartoon rendering, expressive facial features, and a polished, cinematic look. Soft lighting, smooth shading, and a friendly, animated style.

templates.name: OC Nine Grid
templates.description: Generate a single image with 9 sticker expressions arranged in a 3x3 grid layout. Each cell shows the OC with a different emotion.
templates.prompt:
A 3x3 grid layout containing 9 individual sticker cells, each featuring the same character's upper body with long silver hair, black choker, and black gloves. Each sticker shows a different expression or gesture:
Happy and waving
Angry and stomping
Sad and crying
Surprised with open mouth
Shy and blushing
Cool posing
Making a heart shape with hands
Thinking with wonder (question mark above head)
Sleepy and yawning (with "Zzz")
Each sticker has a transparent background with clean sticker-style outlines and no solid colors, backgrounds, or circular borders. All 9 stickers are evenly distributed in a perfect 3x3 grid on one image.

templates.name: Pixel Art
templates.description: Retro pixel art sticker in 8-bit or 16-bit style, with a transparent background and a limited color palette.
templates.prompt: A pixel art sticker in classic 8-bit or 16-bit retro game style. Pixelated rendering, simplified shapes, limited color palette, and sharp pixel edges. Transparent background. Nostalgic and playful aesthetic.

templates.name: Watercolor Soft
templates.description: Soft watercolor sticker with gentle color transitions, pastel palette, and artistic hand-painted texture.
templates.prompt: A soft watercolor sticker with gentle washes, smooth color transitions, and a pastel palette. Soft edges and a dreamy, hand-painted watercolor texture. Light or white background. Artistic and delicate style.

templates.name: Pop Art
templates.description: Bold pop art sticker inspired by comic books, featuring vibrant colors, halftone patterns, and strong outlines.
templates.prompt: A pop art sticker inspired by classic comic books. Features bold, vibrant colors, halftone dot patterns, and thick black outlines. Dynamic, energetic, and eye-catching style.

templates.name: Graffiti
templates.description: Urban graffiti sticker with bold spray paint effects, dynamic lines, and street art style.
templates.prompt: A graffiti-style sticker with bold spray paint effects, dynamic lines, and vibrant street art colors. Urban, edgy, and expressive style with a sense of movement and creativity.

templates.name: Chibi
templates.description: Cute chibi-style sticker featuring exaggerated, adorable characters and playful, rounded text.
templates.prompt: A chibi-style sticker with super cute, exaggerated characters and playful, rounded text. Emphasize the chibi-style cuteness of the main text and characters, using bright and soft colors. The overall style should be lighthearted, lively, and full of childlike charm.

templates.name: Minimal Line Art
templates.description: Minimalist line art sticker with clean, simple lines and a flat 2D design. Transparent background, perfect for digital messaging.
templates.prompt: A minimalist line art sticker featuring clean, simple lines and a flat 2D appearance. No shading or gradients. Transparent background with solid black lines. Modern, geometric, and simple style.

templates.name: No Preset
templates.description: Generate stickers without preset style. The AI will determine the best style based on your input and reference image.
